name: GitHub Runner
description: Self-hosted GitHub Actions runner with Docker, Node.js, Python, Go, Rust, and Claude Code pre-installed. Enables running GitHub Actions workflows on your own infrastructure with full control over the environment and toolchain.

notes.text: Requires a GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) with admin:org scope for organization-level runner registration.
Runner will appear in your GitHub organization settings under Actions > Runners after installation.
Includes Docker, Node.js 22, Python 3.12, Go, Rust, and Claude Code pre-installed.
